import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./Main.css"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const Main = () => { const [itemsCount , setItemsCount] = useState({ sandwich : 1 , pizza : 1 , apple : 1 , banana : 1 , mango : 1 }) const {sandwich , pizza} = useSelector(state => state.food); const {apple , banana , mango} = useSelector(state => state.fruit); const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (

Foods :

Sandwich : {sandwich}
Pizza : {pizza}
setItemsCount({...itemsCount , sandwich : event.target.value})} />
setItemsCount({...itemsCount , pizza : event.target.value})} />

Fruits :

Apple : {apple}
Banana : {banana}
Mango : {mango}
); } export default Main;
